116class rcContext
117{
118public:
121 inline rcContext(bool state = true) : m_logEnabled(state), m_timerEnabled(state) {}
122 virtual ~rcContext() {}
123
126 inline void enableLog(bool state) { m_logEnabled = state; }
127
129 inline void resetLog() { if (m_logEnabled) doResetLog(); }
130
141 void log(const rcLogCategory category, const char* format, ...);
142
145 inline void enableTimer(bool state) { m_timerEnabled = state; }
146
148 inline void resetTimers() { if (m_timerEnabled) doResetTimers(); }
149
152 inline void startTimer(const rcTimerLabel label) { if (m_timerEnabled) doStartTimer(label); }
153
156 inline void stopTimer(const rcTimerLabel label) { if (m_timerEnabled) doStopTimer(label); }
157
161 inline int getAccumulatedTime(const rcTimerLabel label) const { return m_timerEnabled ? doGetAccumulatedTime(label) : -1; }
162
163protected:
165 virtual void doResetLog();
166
171 virtual void doLog(const rcLogCategory category, const char* msg, const int len) { rcIgnoreUnused(category); rcIgnoreUnused(msg); rcIgnoreUnused(len); }
172
174 virtual void doResetTimers() {}
175
178 virtual void doStartTimer(const rcTimerLabel label) { rcIgnoreUnused(label); }
179
182 virtual void doStopTimer(const rcTimerLabel label) { rcIgnoreUnused(label); }
183
187 virtual int doGetAccumulatedTime(const rcTimerLabel label) const { rcIgnoreUnused(label); return -1; }
188
190 bool m_logEnabled;
191
193 bool m_timerEnabled;
194};
195
198class rcScopedTimer
199{
200public:
204 inline rcScopedTimer(rcContext* ctx, const rcTimerLabel label) : m_ctx(ctx), m_label(label) { m_ctx->startTimer(m_label); }
205 inline ~rcScopedTimer() { m_ctx->stopTimer(m_label); }
206
207private:
208 // Explicitly disabled copy constructor and copy assignment operator.
209 rcScopedTimer(const rcScopedTimer&);
210 rcScopedTimer& operator=(const rcScopedTimer&);
211
212 rcContext* const m_ctx;
213 const rcTimerLabel m_label;
214};

250

253

257

264

267

271

279

286static const int RC_SPAN_MAX_HEIGHT = (1 << RC_SPAN_HEIGHT_BITS) - 1;
287
290static const int RC_SPANS_PER_POOL = 2048;
291
294struct rcSpan
295{
296 unsigned int smin : RC_SPAN_HEIGHT_BITS;
297 unsigned int smax : RC_SPAN_HEIGHT_BITS;
298 unsigned int area : 6;
299 rcSpan* next;
300};
301
304struct rcSpanPool
305{
306 rcSpanPool* next;
307 rcSpan items[RC_SPANS_PER_POOL];
308};

326
327private:

329 rcHeightfield(const rcHeightfield&);
330 rcHeightfield& operator=(const rcHeightfield&);
331};

675template<class T> inline void rcSwap(T& a, T& b) { T t = a; a = b; b = t; }
676
681template<class T> inline T rcMin(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }
682
687template<class T> inline T rcMax(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }
688
692template<class T> inline T rcAbs(T a) { return a < 0 ? -a : a; }
693
697template<class T> inline T rcSqr(T a) { return a*a; }
698
704template<class T> inline T rcClamp(T value, T minInclusive, T maxInclusive)
705{
706 return value < minInclusive ? minInclusive: (value > maxInclusive ? maxInclusive : value);
707}
708
712float rcSqrt(float x);
713
717
722inline void rcVcross(float* dest, const float* v1, const float* v2)
723{
724 dest[0] = v1[1]*v2[2] - v1[2]*v2[1];
725 dest[1] = v1[2]*v2[0] - v1[0]*v2[2];
726 dest[2] = v1[0]*v2[1] - v1[1]*v2[0];
727}
728
733inline float rcVdot(const float* v1, const float* v2)
734{
735 return v1[0]*v2[0] + v1[1]*v2[1] + v1[2]*v2[2];
736}
737
743inline void rcVmad(float* dest, const float* v1, const float* v2, const float s)
744{
745 dest[0] = v1[0]+v2[0]*s;
746 dest[1] = v1[1]+v2[1]*s;
747 dest[2] = v1[2]+v2[2]*s;
748}
749
754inline void rcVadd(float* dest, const float* v1, const float* v2)
755{
756 dest[0] = v1[0]+v2[0];
757 dest[1] = v1[1]+v2[1];
758 dest[2] = v1[2]+v2[2];
759}
760
765inline void rcVsub(float* dest, const float* v1, const float* v2)
766{
767 dest[0] = v1[0]-v2[0];
768 dest[1] = v1[1]-v2[1];
769 dest[2] = v1[2]-v2[2];
770}
771
775inline void rcVmin(float* mn, const float* v)
776{
777 mn[0] = rcMin(mn[0], v[0]);
778 mn[1] = rcMin(mn[1], v[1]);
779 mn[2] = rcMin(mn[2], v[2]);
780}
781
785inline void rcVmax(float* mx, const float* v)
786{
787 mx[0] = rcMax(mx[0], v[0]);
788 mx[1] = rcMax(mx[1], v[1]);
789 mx[2] = rcMax(mx[2], v[2]);
790}
791
795inline void rcVcopy(float* dest, const float* v)
796{
797 dest[0] = v[0];
798 dest[1] = v[1];
799 dest[2] = v[2];
800}
801
806inline float rcVdist(const float* v1, const float* v2)
807{
808 float dx = v2[0] - v1[0];
809 float dy = v2[1] - v1[1];
810 float dz = v2[2] - v1[2];
811 return rcSqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz);
812}
813
818inline float rcVdistSqr(const float* v1, const float* v2)
819{
820 float dx = v2[0] - v1[0];
821 float dy = v2[1] - v1[1];
822 float dz = v2[2] - v1[2];
823 return dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz;
824}
825
828inline void rcVnormalize(float* v)
829{
830 float d = 1.0f / rcSqrt(rcSqr(v[0]) + rcSqr(v[1]) + rcSqr(v[2]));
831 v[0] *= d;
832 v[1] *= d;
833 v[2] *= d;
834}

1218
1223inline void rcSetCon(rcCompactSpan& span, int direction, int neighborIndex)
1224{
1225 const unsigned int shift = (unsigned int)direction * 6;
1226 const unsigned int con = span.con;
1227 span.con = (con & ~(0x3f << shift)) | (((unsigned int)neighborIndex & 0x3f) << shift);
1228}
1229
1234inline int rcGetCon(const rcCompactSpan& span, int direction)
1235{
1236 const unsigned int shift = (unsigned int)direction * 6;
1237 return (span.con >> shift) & 0x3f;
1238}
1239
1243inline int rcGetDirOffsetX(int direction)
1244{
1245 static const int offset[4] = { -1, 0, 1, 0, };
1246 return offset[direction & 0x03];
1247}
1248
1249// TODO (graham): Rename this to rcGetDirOffsetZ
1253inline int rcGetDirOffsetY(int direction)
1254{
1255 static const int offset[4] = { 0, 1, 0, -1 };
1256 return offset[direction & 0x03];
1257}
1258
1263inline int rcGetDirForOffset(int offsetX, int offsetZ)
1264{
1265 static const int dirs[5] = { 3, 0, -1, 2, 1 };
1266 return dirs[((offsetZ + 1) << 1) + offsetX];
1267}
